title: Refugee admissions in the U.S. 1990 to 2019
summary: Overall Number of persons has increased over the Year.
Number of persons is roughly constant from '04 to '05, slightly decreasing from '05 to '06, and lastly slightly increasing from '06 to '08.
The most drastic decrease took place within the Year '05 and '06.
The highest Number of persons, of value 60191.0 was reached at Year '08
Minimum Number of persons about 41223.0 was reached at Year '06

The steepest decrease occurs in between the Year '05 and '06.
The highest Number of persons, of value 60191.0 was reached at Year '08
